department: Ministre des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Request for Proposal (RFP) for Freighter Canoes

**RFP Reference Number:** [W0113-23CS33-B]
**Publication Date:** September 19, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 25, 2023 (by 14:00 EDT)

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is inviting tenders for the purchase of freighter canoes, including motors and boat trailers, in support of the Department of National Defence (DND). The Canadian Rangers operate in the Northern regions of Ontario, and these canoes will be used for navigation on rivers and lakes.

**Key Tender Information:**

* **Tender Category:** Goods and Services (Competitive - Open Bidding)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Contract Duration:** Expected contract start date: July 14, 2023; expected contract end date: October 31, 2023

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* **Technical Requirements:** Offerors must demonstrate compliance with all mandatory technical criteria.
* **Cost-Based Evaluation:** Offers will be evaluated based on price.

**Important Tender Documents:**

* Bid submissions must be received by October 25, 2023 (by 14:00 EDT). Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.
* All supporting documentation must be included with the bid submission.

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of National Defence (DND)
* Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada

**Contact Information:**

* Christopher Casale, PSPC
* Email: [christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.casale@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 343-575-5249

**Notification URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17295294?extsite=MTcyOTUyOTRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
This RFP is open to all qualified contractors.
